mapper.insert: insert into core_data.suppliers (id, company_first_name, contact_last_name, contact_title, address1, address2, address3, city, country, postal_code, phone, fax, email, url, payment_methods, discount_type, type_goods, notes, discount_available, current_order, customer_id, size_url, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyFirstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactLastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentMethods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeGoods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountAvailable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sizeUrl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update core_data.suppliers set company_first_name = #{companyFirstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_last_name = #{contactLastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_title = #{contactTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address1 = #{address1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address2 = #{address2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address3 = #{address3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postal_code = #{postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_methods = #{paymentMethods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discount_type = #{discountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_goods = #{typeGoods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discount_available = #{discountAvailable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, current_order = #{currentOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, size_url = #{sizeUrl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_timestamp = #{createdTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_timestamp = #{updatedTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, company_first_name, contact_last_name, contact_title, address1, address2, address3, city, country, postal_code, phone, fax, email, url, payment_methods, discount_type, type_goods, notes, discount_available, current_order, customer_id, size_url, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp from core_data.suppliers where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, company_first_name, contact_last_name, contact_title, address1, address2, address3, city, country, postal_code, phone, fax, email, url, payment_methods, discount_type, type_goods, notes, discount_available, current_order, customer_id, size_url, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp from core_data.suppliers

select id, company_first_name, contact_last_name, contact_title, address1, address2, address3, city, country, postal_code, phone, fax, email, url, payment_methods, discount_type, type_goods, notes, discount_available, current_order, customer_id, size_url, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp from core_data.suppliers where isActive = #{isActive}
